text: Xabier Agirre López (8 April 1951 – 13 February 2021) was a Spanish administrator and politician. He was born in Vitoria-Gasteiz, Spain. He was a member of the Basque Nationalist Party. Agirre was a member of the Basque Parliament from 2004 until 2007 and again from 2012 until 2016. Agirre died in Pamplona, Spain on 13 February 2021, aged 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Spanish politicians Category:2021 deaths
title: Xabier Agirre
